column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " But Aang , the world 's been waiting for the Avatar to return and finally put an end to this war . "
#Text=Aang says : " And how am I going to do that ? "
#Text=Katara says : " According to legend , you need to first master water , then earth , then fire , right ? "
#Text=Aang says : " That 's what the monks told me . "
#Text=Katara says : " Well , if we go to the North Pole , you can master waterbending ! "
#Text=Aang says : " We can learn it together ! "
#Text=Katara says : " And Sokka , I 'm sure you 'll get to knock some firebender heads on the way . "
#Text=Sokka says : " I 'd like that .
#Text=" Aang says : " All right , but before I learn waterbending , we have some serious business to attend to .
#Text=Here , here and here .
#Text=" Katara says : " What 's there ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Here , we 'll ride the hopping llamas .
#Text=Then waaay over here , we 'll surf on the backs of giant koi fish .
#Text=Then back over here , we 'll ride the hog monkeys .
#Text=They do n't like people riding them , but that 's what makes it fun !

#Text=" Main Aang Appa Katara Sokka Antagonists Iroh Zuko says : " Minor Kanna Southern Water Tribe boy Southern Water Tribe girl " Sokka says : " I 'm not one to complain , but ca n't Appa fly any higher ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I have an idea !
#Text=Why do n't we all get on your back and you could fly us to the North Pole ?!
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'd love to .
#Text=Climb on everyone , Sokka 's ready for take off .
#Text=" Katara says : " Look , we 're all just a little tired and cranky because we 've been flying for two days straight .
#Text=" Sokka says : " And for what ?
#Text=We ca n't even find the Northern Water Tribe .
#Text=There 's nothing up here .
#Text="
